titleStmt.title: Gods arrowe of the pestilence. By John Sanford Master of Artes, and chapleine of Magdalen Colledge in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Sanford, John, 1564 or 5-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Ioseph Barnes and are to be sold in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
